definition: a rapid active commotion, pressure or urge someone into an action
details:
noun
- a rapid active commotion
= synonyms: stir
- a swindle in which you cheat at gambling or persuade a person to buy worthless property
= synonyms: con, bunco, bunco game, bunko, bunko game, confidence trick, confidence game, con game, gyp, sting, flimflam
verb
- pressure or urge someone into an action
- move or cause to move energetically or busily
= synonyms: bustle
- cause to move furtively and hurriedly
= example: cause to move furtively and hurriedly
- get by trying hard
= example: get by trying hard
- sell something to or obtain something from by energetic and especially underhanded activity
= synonyms: pluck, roll
